name: theroundtable-backend

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json && npm run copy:data
scripts.build:lambda: npm run clean && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json && npm run copy:data && npm run copy:package && npm run copy:modules && npm run package:lambda
scripts.package:lambda: rm -f lambda.zip && cd dist && rm -rf node_modules/.cache && zip -rq ../lambda.zip . && mv ../lambda.zip lambda.zip
scripts.test:live:required: node -e "if (!process.env.OPENAI_API_KEY || !process.env.REDIS_URL) { console.error('OPENAI_API_KEY and REDIS_URL are required for live tests'); process.exit(1); }" && RESPONSE_GENERATOR_MODE=openai jest --watchman=false --runInBand src/__tests__/live.e2e.test.ts
scripts.ci: npm run lint && npm run type-check && npm run test:coverage && npm run build
scripts.deploy:docker: npm run build && npm run docker-build

description: Backend for The Round Table - an AI-powered historical and fictional character conversation platform
